abstract: NBC ranked a distant third place as its new series “Knight Rider” came up short in the ratings at 8 p.m.
snippet: NBC ranked a distant third place as its new series “Knight Rider” came up short in the ratings at 8 p.m.
lead_paragraph: On a Wednesday night of television that was interrupted by a live address from President Bush at 9 p.m., NBC ranked a distant third place as its new series “Knight Rider” came up short in the ratings at 8 p.m.
